评论概述: great gray & black combo, fits well
评论详情: ANRABESS Long Sleeve Shirts for Women Striped Crewneck Loose Fit Tunic Tops 2024  It's easy to find clothes that are gray & white striped or black & white striped, but it's not common to find something that's a combo of gray & black. So I jumped on this one when I saw it. I normally wear a medium (140lbs, 39" bust) and this fits accurately. The sleeves are long enough (I hate when sleeves are too short), and the length is good. It's not fitted at all, it's a bit wide, but the adequate length prevents it from looking boxy on me. For a more fitted look, I could maybe have sized down to a small, but then the length and sleeves would be too short. This is a very casual shirt. Not a fabric that can be dressed up and particularly soft. It's not rough or anything and is perfectly comfortable. Just not buttery soft (I'm setting expectations here, not complaining). But it's well made. I have no complaints about it. The color combo is my favorite thing, along with the contrasting collar and cuffs. Looks as advertised. I've ordered quite a bit from Anrabess and have been happy with every item so far.
Runs big. It's very cute, comfortable. Looks great under a black Patagonia vest.

I usually wear my tops and sweaters in a large size (I'm 152 pounds, 38D) but decided to try this top in a medium and I'm glad I did - this top fits as shown in the images here. It would have been much too large if I had gotten this in a large.  There's some things I like and some things I don't like about this top. The material is comfortable with a bit of stretch - nice to wear on cooler fall days or late spring. The material feels just a bit heavier than t-shirt material, so here in New England, it's much too thin to wear as is during the winter. The material is not see-through.  What don't I like? I wasn't sure if I would like the drop shoulders and in person, I'm not a fan. With the long sleeves, and the way it's fitted, it just looks like my shoulders are too small for this top.  The quality is OK. There's no issues with loose threads, but the stripes don't line up on the side seams.

These definitely is a loose top.  I did like the striped design, color and quality.  It fits very relaxed, which I welcome, especially if my weight is fluctuating.  The cost is a little higher than I would hope to pay for; but, overall, I have found this brands items to be well-made.  Overall, a cute shirt to add to your closet.

I have a couple shirts in this color scheme but this one is definitely the best.  It is the softest, the most well made and the highest quality.  I believe this one is actually made of cotton and you can feel it.  It hangs just right. And it washed like a dream! I do wash pretty much everything on delicate and dry on low.  This was no different but I didn't dry it all the way.  I love the pink and green contrast and the quality oof this is so good, with stripes being so big this falll, I think I'm going to order this shirt in another color. Really nice shirt and the price is definitely right!

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable—A Perfect Fall Tunic Top!
评论详情: I recently bought the ANRABESS Long Sleeve Striped Crewneck Tunic Top in Green Stripes Combo, Medium, and I couldn’t be happier with it. Here’s why this top has become a favorite:  Fit and Comfort: The Medium size provides a loose, relaxed fit that’s perfect for layering or wearing on its own. The tunic length offers ample coverage, making it ideal for pairing with leggings or skinny jeans. The fabric is soft and comfortable, allowing for easy all-day wear.  Material and Quality: The material is of high quality—soft to the touch and with just the right amount of stretch. It feels durable and well-made, and the striped pattern adds a nice texture without being too heavy. The top maintains its shape and color after washing, which is a testament to its durability.  Design and Style: The green stripes and color block design are stylish and on-trend for fall. The crewneck is classic and versatile, while the striped pattern adds visual interest and a pop of color. The loose fit and color block design give it a casual yet chic appearance that’s easy to dress up or down.  Versatility: This tunic top is incredibly versatile. It can be dressed up with a pair of boots and accessories for a more polished look, or kept casual with sneakers or flats. The length is great for wearing with leggings, making it a comfortable option for both work and casual outings.  Ease of Care: The top is easy to care for, washing well without shrinking or losing its shape. It dries quickly and doesn’t require any special maintenance, which is always a plus for busy individuals.  Overall: The ANRABESS Long Sleeve Striped Crewneck Tunic Top is a fantastic fall wardrobe addition. Its comfortable fit, stylish design, and versatile color make it a standout piece. If you’re looking for a tunic that combines fashion with comfort, this top is definitely worth considering. Highly recommended!

I like this cute black and white striped top with royal blue around the color and wrists. The fabric is mostly cotton and little thicker than your regular shirt. It will be great for the approaching fall weather. The size is perfect for me. I wanted it to be comfortable and not too tight. The description said oversized so I took it for its word and sized down. This versatile shirt can be worn under a jacket for a layered look or alone with leggings or jeans. Affordably priced for a casual look.

I’m 5’2”. It isn’t thin like t shirt material, but not so thick like a sweat shirt. It would be perfect for cool fall days and evenings. Would be good with yoga pants, leggings or jeans. No loose stitching or threads.

I also like the fact that it comes right below my bottom, as I don't like tops that are too short. I am 5'7", 178lbs, usually wear a 12-14 and ordered a Large. This will be a great top to wear when cooler weather finally rolls in!
